Scan.Camera Permission Description: This app uses the camera to scan QR codes with COVID-19 vaccine certificates. This allows verifiers to verify the authenticity of COVID-19 vaccine certificates presented to them.

Result.NotVerifiedText: This SMART Health Card cannot be verified. It may have been corrupted.
